column5: Two weeks ago we went walleye fishing on Lake Erie.  Kevin and I got 16 walleye.  Last Wednesday and Saturday we went perch fishing and got 100 perch each trip out. Wednesday was the best perch fishing I ever had....got 100 perch in three hours.  Perch fishing has been on fire.
but who likes to clean all that perch!
That was short and sweet with tonnes of meat.  Some solid catching out there man!

but who likes to clean all that perch!   With an electric fillet knife it takes about 30-40 seconds per fish to have boneless fillets...   Besides, it's a perfect excuse to have a few beers with your buddy after a day of fishing.
I could use 100 perch just about now! But I'll have to wait for Nipissing to freeze over.  Enjoy the awesome fishing!
thanks guys erie has been good to us all year
I would be very happy to have 100 perch to clean  YUM!  S.
